attributes.action: Remove all strings from Any deal that ties us Into the single market.
attributes.additional_details: No deal should include compromises we did not vote for on the 23rd June 2016. Do not read into the result any other meaning than we voted to Leave!
attributes.background: We Voted on the 23rd June 2016 to leave the EU. we wish to do that In every meaningful way. Stop any deals being done by The British Government which reverses this.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243477
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234179
